Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Have we decided to use workaround (moving code to build and run it) and abandoned this effort? The LTE tests are running in CI already. Let's disucss, if necessary.

Action.author: adnanchoudhury
Action.body: The decision is to not go down the vendoring path and copy the LTE code every time to Fabric and run it from there.Â
